calcCurveParams(bytes).notice: calc a and b for a linear curve (y = ax + b) unit 1 on this curve will sell for p0 unit T-1 on this curve will sell for p1 a = (p1 - p0) / (2*T - 2) b = p0 - a the curve is multiplied by `multiplier` to maintain precision this calculation can be done off-chain, it does not need to be gas optimized

documentation.text:
calc a and b for a linear curve (y = ax + b)
 unit 1 on this curve will sell for p0
 unit T-1 on this curve will sell for p1
 a = (p1 - p0) / (2*T - 2)
 b = p0 - a
 the curve is multiplied by `multiplier` to maintain precision
 this calculation can be done off-chain, it does not need to be gas optimized
